name: Antibody (Soham Malakar)
description:
A submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

Here, you are an antibody. You have to kill the viruses with your reverse gun to save your life.

You will face different kinds of viruses of different colors, choose the right colored bullets to fight against each kind of viruses.

Controls

 - W, A, S & D to move

 - Left mouse button to shoot

 - Scroll mouse wheel or press alpha 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 to change between weapons

Tools Used

 - Unity 2019.3

 - Jetbrains Rider

 - Photoshop CC

 - Bosca Ceoil

 - Vegas Pro

Credits

Special thanks to Sanket Tarafder to create music for this game

Made in 7 days by: Soham Malakar
